short_description:
HData Recovery Wizard is a fast data recovery program, which provides data recovery process to recover lost data from hard drives, USB drives and other external storage. With its good data recovery ability, this software can support almost all file formats in the device. It also provides a customer-friendly help wizard. Follow the instructions of the wizard step by step, the users can easily get started and quickly complete the data recovery process.
HData Recovery Wizard can effectively recover lost, deleted, corrupted or formatted data from storage devices.
250 +File Formats: Photos, videos, music, docs, emails, zip, etc.
Devices: Recover from U disks, external hard drives, digital cameras, iPad, MP3/MP4 players and more.
6 Models to recover all data in any event happened to your device:
Files Deleted Accidently, Disk Formatted accidently,  USB Disk/Card Recovery, Emptied the Recycle Bin Accidently, Partition Damaged/Lost, Universal Restore.
summary: Free Data recovery software download for Windows
